item.title: Getting Started Typescript
item.description: Setting Up TypeScript for Your Project TypeScript is a powerful tool that enhances JavaScript with types, making your code more robust and maintainable. Let’s walk through setting up TypeScript in your project. Step 1: Initialize TypeScript Configuration Start by initializing a TypeScript configuration file: tsc --init This command creates a tsconfig.json file in your project root, which is the heart of your TypeScript setup. It’s where you’ll specify how TypeScript compiles your code.
